SELECT I.LEVEL_NO AS DEPTH_LEVEL, I.INST_CD, I.INST_NM, I.PARENT_CD AS PARENT_INST_CD, I.INST_NM AS FULL_PATH_NAME, NVL(A.CNT, 0) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM TSMINST I LEFT JOIN ( SELECT C.INST_CD, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM USER_ACT_HIST H JOIN COMM_USER C ON H.REG_USER_ID = C.USER_ID WHERE H.REG_DATE LIKE #{month} || '%' GROUP BY C.INST_CD ) A ON I.INST_CD = A.INST_CD WHERE 1 = 1
AND (I.INST_CD = #{institutionCode} OR I.PARENT_CD = #{institutionCode})
AND I.LEVEL_NO = #{codeLevel}
ORDER BY I.INST_CD
SELECT NULL AS DEPTH_LEVEL, NULL AS INST_CD, NULL AS INST_NM, NULL AS PARENT_INST_CD, NULL AS FULL_PATH_NAME, 0 AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM DUAL WHERE 1 = 0
SELECT TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM') + LEVEL - 1, 'DD')) AS YMD FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM')), 'DD')) ORDER BY YMD

SELECT TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(H.REG_DATE, 7, 2)) AS YMD, I.INST_NM, I.INST_CD, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM USER_ACT_HIST H JOIN COMM_USER C ON H.REG_USER_ID = C.USER_ID JOIN TSMINST I ON C.INST_CD = I.INST_CD WHERE H.REG_DATE LIKE #{month} || '%'
AND (I.INST_CD = #{institutionCode} OR I.PARENT_CD = #{institutionCode})
AND I.LEVEL_NO = #{codeLevel}
GROUP BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(H.REG_DATE, 7, 2)), I.INST_NM, I.INST_CD ORDER BY YMD, I.INST_CD
SELECT NULL AS YMD, NULL AS INST_NM, NULL AS INST_CD, 0 AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM DUAL WHERE 1 = 0
